trans-unit.source: Defines a base class for controls that support auto-scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 定義支援自動捲動行為的控制項的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: You do not typically use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> classes inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>類別繼承自這個類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class acts as a base class for controls that require the ability to scroll.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>類別是做為需要可捲動的控制項的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: To enable a control to display scroll bars as needed, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A> property to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用 視需要顯示捲軸的控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性`true`並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A>至所需大小的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the control is sized smaller than the specified minimum size, or a child control is located outside the bounds of the control, the appropriate scroll bars are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項的大小小於指定大小下限，或子控制項位於控制界限外時，會顯示適當的捲軸。

trans-unit.source: To manually override which scroll bars are visible, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要以手動方式覆寫的捲軸會顯示，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If either property is set to `false`, the corresponding scroll bar is not visible, even if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一個屬性設定為`false`，對應的捲軸不可見，即使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event to know when the user or code scrolls the client area.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>知道當使用者或程式碼捲動工作區的事件。

trans-unit.source: When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式將控制項加入表單，當使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>來定位控制項目前的檢視捲動區域內外的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.%23ctor%2A>建構函式會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Marks the current instance as a container control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.ContainerControl> style to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的執行個體標示為 「 容器控制項中，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>方法，以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.ContainerControl>樣式到`true`。

trans-unit.source: Enables background erasing by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.AllPaintingInWmPaint> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您藉由設定清除的背景<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.AllPaintingInWmPaint>至`false`。

trans-unit.source: Disables auto-scrolling by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling> bit to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 停用自動捲動，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>方法，以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>位元`false`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the scroll bars; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示捲軸，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the scroll bars on the container based on the current control positions and the control currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 根據目前控制項的位置以及目前選取的控制項，調整容器上的捲軸。

trans-unit.source: When required, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AdjustFormScrollbars%2A> method lays out the client area, including resizing the display area as required to accommodate the scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 在必要時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AdjustFormScrollbars%2A>方法會配置用戶端區域中，包括為必要項目來容納捲軸，調整大小的顯示區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the container enables the user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出容器是否可讓使用者捲動至任何放置在可視界限以外的控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the container enables auto-scrolling; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果容器啟用自動捲動，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When `true`, this property enables the container to have a virtual size that is larger than its visible boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 當`true`，這個屬性可讓容器大於可視界限的虛擬大小。

trans-unit.source: There is currently a limitation in Windows Forms that prevents all classes derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> from acting properly when both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> is enabled and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form 目前有一項限制，會導致在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> 啟用且 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> 設為 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes> 的情況下，所有衍生自 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> 的類別都無法正常運作。

trans-unit.source: For example, let's say that you place a control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>—or a container class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>)—on your form.
trans-unit.target: 比如說，假設您在表單上放置一個 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> 之類的控制項，或是衍生自 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> 的容器類別 (例如 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> 或 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>)。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> on the container to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes> and then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property on one or more of the controls inside of the container to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>, then no scrollbar ever appears.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將容器上的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> 設為 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes>，然後在容器內的一或多個控制項上，將 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> 屬性設為 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>，則不顯示任何捲軸。

trans-unit.source: The class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> acts as if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> were set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.No>.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> 的類別作用如同 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> 已設為 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.No>。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the only workaround is to nest the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> inside another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: 目前唯一的解決方法是將 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> 巢放在另一個 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> 中。

trans-unit.source: For instance, if you need <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> to work in this situation, you can place it inside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您需要 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 在此情況下運作，您可以將它放在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> 控制項中，並將 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> 上的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> 設為 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> 自動維護捲軸的可見的性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property to `true` has no effect when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 因此，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>屬性`true`沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>已啟用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars are provided automatically as needed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何水平和/或垂直捲軸會自動提供，視需要時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例，請遵循下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Create a new Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: 新建 Windows Forms 應用程式

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> to the form.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> 加入表單。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to the panel and name it `text1`.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>面板，並命名為`text1`。

trans-unit.source: Move the text box so that the right part extends beyond the right edge of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 移動文字方塊右側的組件，已延伸超過面板的右邊緣。

trans-unit.source: You should see only an outline of the part of the text box that is outside the bounds of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 您應該會看到的面板的界限之外的文字方塊部分的外框。

trans-unit.source: If the whole text box is visible, the text box is on the form and not in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以看到整個文字方塊，文字方塊是在表單上，而不是在 [面板]。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> to the form.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> 加入表單。

trans-unit.source: Add a handler for the `Click` event of the button.
trans-unit.target: 加入的處理常式`Click`按鈕的事件。

trans-unit.source: Add the following example code and call it from the button's `Click` handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼，以及從按鈕呼叫此`Click`處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When you run the example, you can only see the part of the text box that is inside the boundaries of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 當您執行範例時，您只可以看到在面板的界限內的文字方塊中的部分。

trans-unit.source: When you click the button, you will see a horizontal scroll bar appear that will enable you to see the rest of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 當您按一下按鈕時，您會看到水平捲軸出現，可讓您查看文字方塊中的其餘部分。

trans-unit.source: If you position a part of the text box below the bottom of the panel, you will see a vertical scroll bar when you click the button.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的文字方塊下方面板的一部分，您會看到垂直捲軸，當您按一下按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The example code checks to see whether the text box is outside the bounds of the panel before it sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property to `true`, and before it sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼會檢查，看看是否在文字方塊中的前面板界限之外設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性`true`，之前它會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This out-of-bounds check is not required.
trans-unit.target: 這超出範圍核取不是必要。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is set to `true`, no scroll bars will appear when the text box is completely within the panel.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>設`true`，沒有捲軸會時，會出現在文字方塊中完全面板中。

trans-unit.source: Also, you can leave the margins at their default settings of 0,0.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以保留的預設設定為 0，0 的邊界。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自動捲動邊界的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the height and width of the auto-scroll margin in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示自動捲動邊界的高度和寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
trans-unit.target: 自動捲動邊界為任何子控制項的可捲動父控制項邊緣之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A> size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine whether or not scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A>大小也會加入可捲動的控制項，來判斷是否需要捲軸中包含任何子控制項的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A> property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A>屬性時可捲動父控制項調整大小或個別子控制項帶入 檢視中，會評估，並且用來判斷是否必須顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 從判斷是否必須顯示捲軸的計算中排除停駐的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If a docked control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Fill?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the control fills the parent scrollable control and the docked control is ignored when using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A> to determine whether scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果停駐控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Fill?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項會填滿與父系的可捲動控制項，使用時，會忽略停駐的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A>來判斷是否需要捲軸。

trans-unit.source: If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 從子控制項的邊緣的距離，以可捲動父控制項是否指派給的值小於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMargin%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`，適當的捲軸顯示。

trans-unit.source: We recommend, when docking controls within a scrollable control, that you add a child scrollable control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, to contain any other controls that might require scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 時，我們建議您使用，停駐控制項內的可捲動的控制項，您將子可捲動的控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>，包含任何可能需要捲動的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You should add the child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control to the scrollable control and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Fill?displayProperty=nameWithType> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您應該加入子系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項以可捲動的控制項及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Fill?displayProperty=nameWithType>及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: You should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property of the parent scrollable control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您應該設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>以可捲動父控制項的屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example evaluates the location of a text box and changes the appearance and behavior of its parent container, the panel control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例評估文字方塊的位置，並變更的外觀和行為的父容器，panel 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Place the text box on the panel so that it overlaps at least one of the panel's edges.
trans-unit.target: 將文字方塊中放置在 [面板] 中，讓它至少一個面板的邊緣重疊。

trans-unit.source: Call this function on the click of a button to see the difference in the panel's behavior and appearance.
trans-unit.target: 按一下以查看在面板的行為和外觀差異按鈕上呼叫此函式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> value assigned is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指派的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> 值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the auto-scroll.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自動捲動大小的最小值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that determines the minimum size of the virtual area through which the user can scroll.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 決定使用者可以捲動的最小虛擬區域大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A> property is used to manage the screen size allocated to the automatic scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A>屬性用來管理配置給自動捲軸的螢幕大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the auto-scroll position.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自動捲動的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the auto-scroll position in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，表示自動捲動的位置 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> property represents the location of the visible portion of a scrollable control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>屬性代表可捲動的控制項的可見部分的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the portion of the control that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來變更所顯示控制項的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式將控制項加入表單，當使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>來定位控制項目前的檢視捲動區域內外的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> coordinate values retrieved are negative if the control has scrolled away from its starting position (0,0).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>座標擷取的值為負數，如果控制項已捲動離開其起始位置 (0，0)。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, you must always assign positive <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values to set the scroll position relative to the starting position.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定這個屬性時，您必須一律指派正數<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>設定捲軸位置相對的開始位置的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a horizontal scroll bar and you set x and y to 200, you move the scroll 200 pixels to the right; if you then set x and y to 100, the scroll appears to jump the left by 100 pixels, because you are setting it 100 pixels away from the starting position.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有水平捲軸，並將 x 和 y 為 200，您將捲動 200 像素為單位向右移;如果您接著將 x 和 y 到 100 之間，捲軸就會向左移 100 個像素，因為您將它 100 像素離開的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: In the first case, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> returns {-200, 0}; in the second case, it returns {-100,0}.
trans-unit.target: 在第一個案例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>傳回 {-200，0}; 在第二個案例中，它會傳回 {-100,0}。

trans-unit.source: To detect when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> changes, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, save the old position value in a private variable, and compare the new value to the old value on subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> events.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵測何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>變更、 建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，將舊的位置值儲存在私用變數，並比較要在後續的舊值的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> and adds a button to the upper left corner of the scrollable area.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>並將按鈕加入至可捲動區域的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The example allows for the offset determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 範例中允許的位移，取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example was written under the assumption that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> on it.
trans-unit.target: 此範例假設您有寫入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>在其上。

trans-unit.source: To enable auto-scrolling, place the button outside of the client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用自動捲動，放置按鈕的用戶端區域之外<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含建立控制項之控制代碼時所需的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the virtual display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示控制項之虛擬顯示區域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項顯示區的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A> property is the virtual size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A>屬性是虛擬的大小和位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the width and height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> are both 100 pixels and the control contains controls that extend beyond its boundaries, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A> represents the size the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> needs to be to include the contained controls.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果寬度和高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>這兩個 100 像素和控制項包含延伸超過其界限時，控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A>代表大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>必須是包含所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A> are relevant to the scroll position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A>相關的捲動位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dock padding settings for all edges of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項所有邊的停駐填補設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges" /> that represents the padding for all the edges of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges" />，表示停駐控制項所有邊緣的邊框距離。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the border inside of this control for docked components.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會控制此控制項的停駐元件內框線。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges> properties, setting each individually on the click of the button.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會停駐面板控制項中的按鈕，並逐一循環<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>屬性，設定每個個別上按下按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> on a form, and you have declared a class level member variable named `myCounter` as a 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>在表單上和您宣告類別層級的成員變數，名為`myCounter`為 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: You should call this code on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of the button.
trans-unit.target: 您應該呼叫此程式碼上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>按鈕的事件。

trans-unit.source: The flag to check.
trans-unit.target: 要進行檢查的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified flag has been set.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的旗標是否已設定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified flag has been set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的旗標已經設定，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the flags the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control uses.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的旗標<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>控制使用。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取遮罩是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取遮罩是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取遮罩是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to retrieve whether the user has made the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> scroll.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取是否將使用者所做的遮罩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>捲軸。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to retrieve whether the user has enabled the full window drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取是否已啟用完整視窗拖放作業的使用者遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the characteristics associated with the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得與水平捲軸相關聯的特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties" /> that contains information about the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties" />，其中包含水平捲軸的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties> class contains information about the scroll bar and its operation, such as whether it is enabled and visible, the scroll page size, orientation, display position, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties>類別包含捲軸和其作業的相關資訊，例如已啟用並且可見、 捲軸頁面大小、 方向，顯示的位置，等等。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the horizontal scroll bar is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出水平捲軸是否為可見的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the horizontal scroll bar is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果水平捲軸是可見的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property can also be accomplished through calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible> as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>屬性也可以透過呼叫完成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: **Note** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>自動維護的捲軸的可見性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> properties to `true` have no effect when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 因此，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>屬性`true`沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>已啟用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the vertical scroll bar is visible, which means that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the mouse wheel scrolls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control vertically.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以看到垂直捲軸，這表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`，滑鼠滾輪捲動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>垂直控制。

trans-unit.source: However, if only the horizontal scroll bar is visible, which means that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> is set to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property to set to `true,` the mouse wheel scrolls horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果只顯示水平捲軸，則表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>設`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true,`水平捲動滑鼠滾輪。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user or code scrolls through the client area.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者或程式碼捲動工作區時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event occurs when the user scrolls through the client area by interacting with the scroll bars, or when the user navigates between controls and the active control scrolls into view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>事件發生於使用者捲動捲軸，與互動的工作區，或是當使用者瀏覽控制項之間和作用中的控制項將捲動至檢視。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event also occurs when you write code, such as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> property, that scrolls through the client area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>當您撰寫程式碼，例如設定時，也就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>捲動工作區的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A> property in your event handler to determine the scroll bar orientation for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>屬性，在您的事件處理常式，來判斷捲軸列方向<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ScrollableControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ScrollableControl1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: The child control to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: 要捲動至檢視中的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the specified child control into view on an auto-scroll enabled control.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的子控制項捲動至已啟用自動捲動之控制項的檢視中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property must be set to `true`, and at least one of the scroll bars, horizontal or vertical, must also be visible, for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A> method to have an effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`，而且至少一個捲軸、 水平或垂直，必須有可見的如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A>方法造成影響。

trans-unit.source: To make the horizontal and vertical scroll bars visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> properties, respectively, must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示水平和垂直捲軸，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>屬性，分別必須設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the `activeControl` parameter is not a child control, no action takes place.
trans-unit.target: 如果`activeControl`參數不是子控制項，就會發生任何動作。

trans-unit.source: This method may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enables auto-scrolling for a form, resizes the form, and ensures that a button remains visible after the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會啟用自動捲動的表單、 調整表單，並確保後調整表單大小時，維持可見 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `button2` on it.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名為`button2`在其上。

trans-unit.source: Determines the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling> field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>欄位是遮罩。

trans-unit.source: You can use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>方法來取得及設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the user has enabled full window drag.
trans-unit.target: 判斷使用者是否已啟用完整的視窗拖曳。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateFullDrag> field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateFullDrag>欄位是遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set whether the user has enabled full window drag.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>方法來取得及設定是否使用者已啟用完整視窗拖曳。

trans-unit.source: When full window drag is enabled, the contents of windows are displayed when the user moves and sizes the windows.
trans-unit.target: 啟用完整視窗拖曳時，當使用者在移動和調整大小的 windows 時，會顯示視窗的內容。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll" /> 屬性值是否設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible> field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible>欄位是遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>方法來取得及設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the user had scrolled through the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 判斷使用者是否已捲動 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateUserHasScrolled> field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateUserHasScrolled>欄位是遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> method to get whether the user had scrolled through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>方法來取得使用者具有捲動瀏覽是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll" /> 屬性值是否設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible> field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible>欄位是遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>方法來取得及設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The child control to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: 要捲動至檢視中的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the scroll offset to the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 計算指定之子控制項的捲動位移。

trans-unit.source: The upper-left hand <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> of the display area relative to the client area required to scroll the control into view.
trans-unit.target: 顯示區域的左上 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，其相對於將控制項捲動至檢視中所需的工作區。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollToControl%2A> method to calculate how far it must scroll to display the specified control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollToControl%2A>方法來計算距離它必須捲動至顯示在指定的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoScrollOffset%2A> property of the child control is used to adjust the scrolled position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoScrollOffset%2A>子控制項的屬性用來調整捲動的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollToControl%2A> does not cause scrolling; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A> method is typically used to subsequently scroll to the calculated position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollToControl%2A> 不會造成捲動;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A>方法通常用於後續捲動導出的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the auto-scroll margins.
trans-unit.target: 設定自動捲動邊界的大小。

trans-unit.source: The margin sets the width and height of the border around each control.
trans-unit.target: 邊界設定每個控制項周圍的框線的高度與寬度。

trans-unit.source: This margin is used to determine when scroll bars are needed on the container and where to scroll to when a control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 此邊界用來判斷捲軸在容器上所需及在何處，捲動至選取控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If a negative number is passed in as the `x` or `y` values, the value will be reset to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果是負數值會被`x`或`y`值，該值將會重設為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example evaluates the location of a text box and changes the appearance and behavior of its parent container, the panel control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例評估文字方塊的位置，並變更的外觀和行為的父容器，panel 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that you have created an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控制項， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Place the box on the panel so that it overlaps at least one of the panel's edges.
trans-unit.target: 將方塊放置在 [面板] 中，讓它至少一個面板的邊緣重疊。

trans-unit.source: Call this subprocedure on the click of a button to see the difference in the panel's behavior and appearance.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此子程序，在按一下按鈕以查看在面板的行為和外觀的差異。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset at which to position the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 要定位 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" /> 的水平位移。

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset at which to position the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 要定位 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" /> 的垂直位移。

trans-unit.source: Positions the display window to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 將顯示視窗定位至指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A> property is the virtual size and position displayed client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A>屬性是虛擬的大小和位置顯示用戶端區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A> method to scroll through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> to the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A>方法來捲動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>到指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation(System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> does not update the position of the scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation(System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> 不會更新捲軸的位置。

trans-unit.source: To update the scroll bars, call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AdjustFormScrollbars(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新捲軸，呼叫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AdjustFormScrollbars(System.Boolean)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The scroll state flag to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的捲動狀態旗標。

trans-unit.source: The value to set the flag.
trans-unit.target: 要設定旗標的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified scroll state flag.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的捲動狀態旗標。

trans-unit.source: When the bit parameter is set to one of the fields of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> method updates the state of the control to the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當元參數設定為其中一個欄位的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>方法會更新控制項的狀態`value`參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the valid parameters and their values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需有效的參數和值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the characteristics associated with the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得與垂直捲軸相關聯的特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties" /> that contains information about the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties" />，其中包含垂直捲軸的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties> class contains information about the scroll bar and its operation, such as whether it is enabled and visible, the scroll page size, orientation, display position, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>類別包含捲軸和其作業的相關資訊，例如已啟用並且可見、 捲軸頁面大小、 方向，顯示的位置，等等。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the vertical scroll bar is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出垂直捲軸是否為可見的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the vertical scroll bar is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果垂直捲軸為可見的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property can also be accomplished through calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible> as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>屬性也可以透過呼叫完成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: **Note** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>自動維護的捲軸的可見性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> properties to `true` have no effect when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 因此，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>屬性`true`沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>已啟用。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。
